The IBM Garage for Cloud Developer Tools supports the installation into a number of
Kubernetes-based cluster technologies. The tools can be installed into multiple clusters and support
managed cluster environments. The installation process is built using
. For a more detailed explanation on this you can read the

before starting any of the installations paths.

If you have an existing IBM Cloud managed cluster, use the

<Row>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Install New"
    subTitle="Create a new IBM Cloud managed cluster with all the Development Tools installed"
    href="/admin/installation-ibm-cloud"
    >

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Install Existing"
    subTitle="Install the Development Tools into an existing IBM Cloud managed cluster"
    href="/admin/installation-existing"
    >

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Install Red Hat CRC"
    subTitle="Install the Development Tools into Red Hat CodeReady Containers"
    href="/admin/installation-crc"
    >
